description: Completed Intermediate education in the Science stream with a strong foundation in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics. Developed analytical thinking and problem-solving skills with a focus on learning new concepts and technologies.
Mastered core Data Structures and Algorithms. Solved 500+ challenges, focusing on Big O optimization and efficient memory management in JavaScript/TypeScript.
Architecting high-performance web applications focusing on the MERN stack. Successfully deployed multiple full-scale projects with integrated authentication and real-time databases.
